Instruction: Prepare pizza dough according to package instructions. Roll out dough into a desired shape.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border.
Crumble vegan mozzarella and distribute evenly over the sauce.
Slice mushrooms, red onion, and green bell pepper. Arrange on top of the pizza.
Sprinkle with vegan parmesan, dried oregano, dried basil, and garlic powder.
Bake in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
